response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price tailored to reflect its true worth. Considering its intrinsic value to you, we propose a price of $950,000. This offer aims to provide a fair balance between maximizing the return on our investment and ensuring that you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. We look forward to your positive consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits us both. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 950000}
